reviews.author: Simon Fortin
reviews.text: Very amazing trip on the Whitehaven Dreamer.Dave the captain is very passionate. Emily the host was very kind. I recommend. We saw whales, dolphins. We swam with turtles, fishes etc..  thanks a lot.

reviews.author: Yan Kasianczuk
reviews.text: Huge thanks to Arron, Natalia, and the Sailing Whitsundays team for an incredible 2D2N Getaway trip! My wife and I did this trip as part of our honeymoon in September 2025 and highly recommend it. Thank you!

reviews.author: Customer
reviews.text: Fantastic trip on a very comfortable boat. The organisation was excellent, and the staff were extremely professional throughout. Would highly recommend this company for a trip out to Whitehaven Beach!

reviews.author: Customer
reviews.text: Amazing adventure with an absolutely wonderful crew! We loved all the snorkel and beach stops and saw so many pretty views and cool wildlife! ... Amazing trip!
